context: Hi! I have a couple of questions...Is the black controller the original sony controller that came with your PS? Also are there any problems with the black controller?
response: I think the black controller is the original sony controller. And it haven't any problem.

context: Do you have to purchase backs  with it to work? in other words what does it connect to?
response: It's just the cord you would have to have the little battery pack in order for it to work so yes you would have to get the backs ... If you don't have them

context: hey guys does this fit the newer model vita? i have that one and im having trouble finding good accessories
response: Yes, it´s made for it and I like it.

context: Do the Skylanders Giants work on an Xbox 360?
response: The actual figure will work on any platform, but the game needs to be specific to you machine. So you would need to buy the starter pack for an Xbox 360.

context: Unless I actually worked at a Microsoft factory and produced the console, what is the reason I should buy this ?
response: I thought I told people not to buy this console that said " I made this!" I said they would be coming out with white xbox's eventually and they are later this year!

context: How loud of sound do the keys on the keyboard make when typing? Does it give off a loud "click clacky" sound when typing?
response: Yea I like it that way but it's definetly not quiet

response: Please refer to the manufacturer Playstation website for content of this game

context: Is this joystick compatible with Windows 8/8.1?
response: Sorry haven't used in ISO8.. Great stick though.. worked for all previous setups and been good to this date on my Older system...

context: Any big difference Gaming wise between the backlit version and the standard version? And about the keys,  the stealth or the clicky one?
response: The keyboard functions and feels we exactly the same as the back lit version. I have one of each. Just the keys are quieter.

context: On what programs (Vista, 7, XP) does it work on?
response: I've run it on Windows 7, and can only testify to that OS.  So, I would be surprised if it weren't compatible with XP. I don't know (and have my doubts) as to whether it would work on Windows 8.

context: Is the game fun for adults as well as kids?
response: Yes, it's fun for adults and kids. There is no violence here, except hitting the animals to feed off them. But overall, this is a creative game to build, create, and survive in a fantasy world.

context: Will this game work with xbox 360 system link?
Mac OS X? Anyone know if this thing works at all on a Mac?
response: I just put this into my MacBook. It works perfectly as a normal mouse. However, the software CD does not work.

context: Does this keyboard have mechanical keys?
response: No it doesn't, it's all plastic.

context: Does it only have miku in it?
response: I think you should read the title again

context: Does this come as a single CD key for both, or one for each?
response: There is a key for each title so two plus codes for dlc that have to activated in game.

context: does it have a circular octagonal or square gate ? the ps3 version of it has both circular gate and octagonal gate too.  does this bring both ?
response: It comes with a square gate installed by default and a round and octagonal gates inside the box if you prefer. The installation is really simple
